R Robin Kohrs 2022-06-25 Chapter 1 Intro 1.1 attach a datframe This creates a new environment suppressMessages(attach(mtcars)) plot(mpg, cyl) search() # list search paths for r objects -> the mtcars object is now a search path ## [1] ".GlobalEnv" "mtcars" "mtcars" "mtcars" "mtcars" ## [6] "mtcars" "mtcars" "mtcars" "mtcars" "mtcars" ## [11] "mtcars" "mtcars" "mtcars" "mtcars" "mtcars" ## [16] "mtcars" "mtcars" "mtcars" "mtcars" "mtcars" ## [21] "mtcars" "package:magrittr" "mtcars" "package:forcats" "package:stringr" ## [26] "package:dplyr" "package:purrr" "package:readr" "package:tidyr" "package:tibble" ## [31] "package:ggplot2" "package:tidyverse" "tools:rstudio" "package:stats" "package:graphics" ## [36] "package:grDevices" "package:utils" "package:datasets" "package:methods" "Autoloads" ## [41] "org:r-lib" "package:base" # http://adv-r.had.co.nz/Environments.html ls(envir=as.environment(mtcars)) ## [1] "am" "carb" "cyl" "disp" "drat" "gear" "hp" "mpg" "qsec" "string" "vs" "wt"
